comment.body: Ethereum is written wrong (the "i" in etherium should be an e)
Making a site is simple indeed in ZN. Bravo devs!

Yeah, I like that too. 

I don't go to sites that want to "waste" my HD without telling me why. 
My recommendation would be to move the large files elsewhere (e.g. other ZN site, or even external IPFS or so).
about update2: there needs to be done more than that, see "III. how to allow ZeroVerse.bit users on my site?" http://127.0.0.1:43110/zeroblog.bit/?Post:15:get+yourself+an+ID+@+ZeroVerse.bit
